about_the_game:
The demo version contains three specially created levels not included in the full game

Arkos is a first-person fantasy shooter with unique voxel render. You play as the white wizard Arkos, who went in search of a powerful weapon of his teacher elf Corvus, who disappeared without a trace many years ago in the dungeons of an ancient castle.

Arkos inspired by the classic old first person shooters of the 90s like Heretic, Hexen and Catacomb3D, but rendered in one TRUE voxel volume.

The game was made by one person with a lot of help from the composer.

Features:

Unique voxel environment
6 Beautiful weapons
3 Episodes with a Boss Battles
MIDI Soundtrack by kubikami
Tons of Enemies
Pure retro action with some puzzle elements

Over the years of textured cubes,we have begun to forget what real voxels are.
Make Voxels Great Again!
